INVALID_ELECTRONIC_SALE.MESSAGE: Some values of your electronic sale are being undefined.

INVALID_CASH_SALE.MESSAGE: Some values of your in-cash sale are being undefined.

INVALID_OUTFLOW.MESSAGE: Some values of your outflow are being undefined.

INVALID_PAGINATION_REQUEST.MESSAGE: You should provide a page and pageSize values to paginate the transactions.

INVALID_PAGINATION_VALUES.MESSAGE: Invalid pagination parameters. Page and pageSize must be positive integers.
